name: helianthus pauciflorus
description: Also known as Helianthus rigidus or H. laetiflorus (Stiff or Prairie Sunflower), Showy Sunflower is host to the Gorgone Checkerspot, a butterfly that is restricted to high quality prairie dry remnants.Â  Showy Sunflower is rhizomatous and aggressive and therefore may not be suitable for small landscape plantings.
features: Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
